metadata.title: CVE-2020-8151 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: There is a possible information disclosure issue in Active Resource <v5.1.1that could allow an attacker to create specially crafted requests to accessdata in an unexpected way and possibly leak information.

criterions.comment: rails: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
